config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code retrieves the default escape character from the database settings and uses it in the search string escape method and the CompareLike constructor.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The configuration is triggered whenever the getSearchStringEscape method is called or when a new instance of CompareLike is created.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the DEFAULT_ESCAPE configuration option is that it determines the default escape character used in search string operations and comparisons in the system.
